title: Language Learning Course Based on Knowledge Revision and Epistemic Profiling

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language comprehension skills and basic scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducting counter-text-based activities in smartphone-enabled environments, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and correct misconceptions about scientific concepts (e.g., weather phenomena) through refutation texts.
Learners can analyze their epistemic profiles (authority, personal opinion, multiple sources) and select appropriate learning strategies.
Learners must present concrete results of refutation text utilization in project-based assessments (e.g., case reports on correcting misconceptions in science).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
